product_name: GoPro The Handler Mount and Floating Hand Grip
long_description: Whether capturing water selfies, POV freestyling or follow-cam footage, this floating hand grip offers increased stability and control, so you can easily aim and frame shots with confidence.
short_description: Whether capturing water selfies, POV freestyling or follow-cam footage, this floating hand grip offers increased stability and control, so you can easily aim and frame shots with confidence.
